verses.verse: (For the choir director; according to Jeduthun. A Psalm of David.) My soul <WH5315> [waits] in silence <WH1747> for God <WH430> only; <WH389> From Him is my salvation. <WH3444>
He only <WH389> is my rock <WH6697> and my salvation, <WH3444> My stronghold; <WH4869> I shall not be greatly <WH7227> shaken. <WH4131>

How <WH575> long <WH5704> will you assail <WH9095> a man, <WH376> That you may murder <WH7523> [him,] all <WH3605> of you, Like a leaning <WH5186> wall, <WH1447> like a tottering <WH1760> fence <WH1447>?

They have counseled <WH3289> only <WH389> to thrust <WH5080> him down <WH5080> from his high <WH7613> position; <WH7613> They delight <WH7521> in falsehood; <WH3577> They bless <WH1288> with their mouth, <WH6310> But inwardly <WH7130> they curse. <WH7043> Selah. <WH5542>
My soul, <WH5315> wait <WH1826> in silence <WH1826> for God <WH430> only, <WH389> For my hope <WH8615> is from Him.
He only <WH389> is my rock <WH6697> and my salvation, <WH3444> My stronghold; <WH4869> I shall not be shaken. <WH4131>
On God <WH430> my salvation <WH3468> and my glory <WH9202> [rest]; The rock <WH6697> of my strength, <WH5797> my refuge <WH4268> is in God. <WH430>
Trust <WH982> in Him at all <WH3605> times, <WH6256> O people; <WH5971> Pour <WH8210> out your heart <WH3824> before <WH6440> Him; God <WH430> is a refuge <WH4268> for us. Selah. <WH5542>

Men <WH1121> <WH120> of low <WH1121> <WH120> degree <WH1121> <WH120> are only <WH389> vanity, <WH1892> and men <WH1121> <WH376> of rank <WH376> are a lie; <WH3577> In the balances <WH3976> they go <WH5927> up; They are together <WH3162> lighter than <WH4480> breath. <WH1892>

Do not trust <WH982> in oppression, <WH6233> And do not vainly <WH1891> hope <WH1891> in robbery; <WH1498> If <WH3588> riches <WH2428> increase, <WH5107> do not set <WH7896> [your] heart <WH3820> [upon them.]
Once <WH259> God <WH430> has spoken; <WH1696> Twice <WH8147> I have heard <WH8085> this: <WH2098> That power <WH5797> belongs to God; <WH430>
And lovingkindness <WH2617> is Thine, O Lord, <WH136> For Thou dost recompense <WH9608> a man <WH376> according to his work. <WH4639>
